author.name: Jakob
author.title: Web Developer
author.description: Hi! My name is Jakob, I love to design and build modern experiences on the web. I also love learning in public and working on little side projects that help others build things faster. This is my very first attempt to build my own stuff on the web.

site.siteDescription: This is Jakob's first attempt to build a website
